classes

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Order

  • public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
    The order class represents a list of meals that the client might order in the restaurant. These meal can be personalized, and the final price of these orders will be computed according to the offers and discounts that apply.
    Author:
    Achraf Gharbi, Younes Laaboudi

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice(Offer[] offers)
        This method is the one that computes the price the client will have to pay given that a certain number of discounts may apply.
        Parameters:
        offers - We have to put all the offers available in the list offers.
        Returns:
        the final price of the order after discounts.
